agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that grants wishes for seniors.
service_description: Fulfills special wishes for seniors through charitable donations. Applicants may be connected with their local chapter. Application forms may be downloaded from the website.
site_details: Call to connect with a Wish Coordinator or download an application from the website.
site_eligibility: Seniors, ages 65 or older -OR- permanent resident of a long-term care nursing facility -- Household income at or below 200% of the Federal Poverty Level -- Capable of communicating and experiencing the wish granted
